## EU4toVic2 flag library - until it is converted to the new blazon script, it is used as "textured emblems"
legacy_AAA = {
	pattern = "pattern_per_bend.dds"
	color1 = "red"
	color2 = "black"
}
legacy_AAA_communist = {
	pattern = "pattern_per_bend.dds"
	color1 = "red"
	color2 = "black"
}

legacy_AAC = {
	pattern = "pattern_solid.tga"
	color1 = "yellow"

	colored_emblem = {
		texture = "ce_eagle.dds"
		instance = { scale = { 0.5 0.8 } position = { 0.5 0.5 } } 
		color1 = "black"
		color2 = "red"
		color3 = "white"
	}	
}
